question: Identify trends in technology adoption across different industries based on recent company data.

subtasks.task: Gather data on technology focus areas from companies to identify which technologies are currently being highlighted as strategic by each company.
Collect information on IT trends tied to each industry to analyze how each industry is prioritizing technology adoption over recent years.
Compile social media engagement data from companies to see which technologies are generating more interest among companies' social media followers and audiences.
Aggregate financial data such as revenue and net income for companies from various industries to correlate technology adoption trends with financial performance.
Analyze vendor contracts to evaluate the technology services being adopted by companies and identify emerging technologies trending in contracts across industries.
